argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mpd3an3.2 | |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ch ) |
| 2 |  | mpd3an3.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ ps /\ ch ) -> th ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_mpd3an3 | |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> th ) |
\
 Stoic logic Thema 2 version b.  See ~ stoic2a . Version b is with the phrase "or both".  We already have this rule as ~ mpd3an3 , so here we prove the equivalence and discourage its use. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 17-Feb-2019.)
